#summary &thorn character entity
#labels about-html,from-w3c
#sidebar TOCCharacterEntitiesT

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesT T] > &thorn

== Value ==

There are 4 variations of this entity:

  * `&THORN;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00de/index.htm U+000DE].
  * `&THORN` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00de/index.htm U+000DE].
  * `&thorn;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00fe/index.htm U+000FE].
  * `&thorn` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00fe/index.htm U+000FE].
